ProductAttributeSet.name: ProductAttributeSet
ProductAttributeSet.description: Used to group variation attributes that apply to one or more products.

Description.description: A meaningful description of the product attribute set. Limited to 255 characters.

DeveloperName.description: Required. The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization. Label is Record Type Name. This field is automatically generated, but you can supply your own value if you create the record using the API.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated ProductAttributeSet in Metadata API. The full name can include a namespace prefix.

Language.description: The language of the product attribute set.

ManageableState.description: Type ManageableState enumerated list Properties Filter, Group, Nillable, Restricted picklist, Sort Description Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

MasterLabel.description: Label for the product attribute set.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.

ProductAttributeSet.accessRules: You must have the B2B Commerce license and a CMS workspace to access products.
